ANU.name: Helen Ennis
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
interest: Photography, histories of photography, art history, visual arts, biography, death studies, museology and curatorship.
ANU.biography: Helen was Director of the Centre for Art History and Art Theory at the School of Art and Design from 2014-18 and was appointed the Sir William Dobell Chair of Art History in 2014. She was formerly Curator of Photography at the National Gallery of Australia, 1985-92, before joining the Art Theory Workshop at ANU School of Art in 1995. She is a Fellow of the Academy of the Humanities.
